About Me

Hello, I'm Jian-Wei Zhang (张建伟)
I am a Ph.D student at State Key Lab of CAD&CG of Zhejiang University advised by Prof. Wei Chen.
My work focuses on image segmentation, few-shot learning, and image generation under a low-data scenario (i.e., few-shot or few labels).

Publications

You can also find my articles on my Google Scholar profile.

Publications: 2022, 2021, 2020, 2018
